title: IBM Canadaâ€™s First Female GM of Technology Charts New Course in AI
description: Deb Pimentel, IBM Canada’s first female general manager of technology, is leading the corporation into uncharted territory in the rapidly changing field of technology. Pimentel’s nearly three-decade career at IBM is a testament to the industry’s changing dynamics as well as her unwavering dedication to flexibility. From her early days as a marketing trainee to […]
